original_text: And when I beheld, lo, the sinews and the flesh came up upon them, and the skin covered them above: but there was no breath in them.
korean_text: 내가 또 보니 그 뼈에 힘줄이 생기고 살이 오르며 그 위에 가죽이 덮이나 그 속에 생기는 없더라

sentences.original_text: the sinews and the flesh came up upon them,
and the skin covered them above:
but there was no breath in them.
